description.narrative: For After the end of the civil war, Burundi began a sustained period of growth: increasing population, economic growth, consumption and resource use. 350 Burundi Network on Climate Change (350 BNCC) is working to make sure that the growth is environmentally sustainable. The group will use the GGF grant to hold a Power Shift Summit gathering 100 young climate leaders from 17 provinces of Burundi to launch a national climate movement and a yearlong campaign on access to and large scale adoption of clean energy technology. The group will produce a documentary on climate change effects in Burundi and will use media sources to highlight the impact of climate change on food security, energy, forestry, biodiversity, health, water, fisheries, etc. 350 BNCC will produce training and capacity building materials (brochures, modules, booklets, etc) and will partner with other groups to organize a national training caravan program
